Sequence Information.Peptide Name: R[G4a]-SHa (RNST-2, Synthetic AMPs, retro-NST-2, XXD, XXA, UCLL1c; Derivative: RLFP-1; RLFP-2)
Sequence Information.Source: Source: sequence reversal, designed, man-made sequences

Literature Information.Literature:
Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (64.29%) toLausporin-1L:23%, G=F: 15%.Chemical modification:  A10 is D-amino acid; C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus NCTC 13277 MRSA (MIC 3.12 uM), B. subtilis ATCC 23857 (MIC 1.56 uM), Gram- S. typhi ATCC 14028 (MIC 50 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 50 uM), P.aeruginosa ATCC 10145 (MIC 200 uM), and fungi C. albicans ATCC 36082 (MIC 15.6 uM).Structure:  helical in 20 mM SDS.In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 13.8 uM; hemolytic. Breast cancer cells MCF-7 (IC50 53 uM), cervical cancer Hela cells (IC50 60 uM).SAR: conjugation of XX with the C-terminal lysine sidechain led to RLFP-1;
conjugation of XX with the sidechain of K3 led to RLFP-2;
Literature Information.Author: Abdullah SJ, Guan JS, Mu Y, Bhattacharjya S.2024
Literature Information.Title: Synthesis of Temporin-SHa Retro Analogs with Lysine Addition/Substitution and Antibiotic Conjugation to Enhance Antibacterial, Antifungal, and Anticancer Activities.
